EmailTemplate.subject: Training Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Volunteer_Orientation_Training__c.Volunteer__c},
You have successfully completed {!Volunteer_Orientation_Training__c.Orientation_Training_Hidden__c}. Please log in to the Make-A-Wish Volunteer Center to complete any additional required role-specific training.
If this was your final required training, we are excited to welcome you as a Make-A-Wish® volunteer. Please log in to the Make-A-Wish Volunteer Center where you can stay informed about everything happening at our chapter. You’ll find:
New volunteer opportunities Information about the wish-granting process Helpful tips Ways to get even more involved in helping kids with life-threatening medical conditions
As always, please feel free to contact the chapter at the number below with any questions, comments, concerns or ideas.
Thanks,
{!Volunteer_Orientation_Training__c.Account_Name__c} {!Volunteer_Orientation_Training__c.Account_Phone__c} {!Volunteer_Orientation_Training__c.Account_Email__c}
